Bleeding.name: Bleeding
Bleeding.description: At the end of turn, <c=downside>take 1 damage</c> and decrease this by 1.

BloodMirror.name: Blood Mirror
BloodMirror.description: Whenever you take hull damage, your enemy also takes as much. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of each turn.</c>

Transfusion.name: Transfusion
Transfusion.description: At the start of turn, gain 1 <c=status>TRANSFUSING</c>. <c=downside>Decrease by 1 for each hull damage taken.</c>

Transfusing.name: Transfusing
description: When <c=status>TRANSFUSING</c> reaches the amount of <c=status>TRANSFUSION</c> on this ship, <c=heal>heal for that amount</c> and remove both.
If you still have <c=status>TRANSFUSING</c> at the end of combat, <c=heal>heal for its amount</c>.
